## ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Sept. 19, 2025): The Hidden Cost of Walled Gardens

Explores how companies like Rover, TaskRabbit, and Nextdoor monetize content and relationships while creators and workers do the actual value-creation. Argues that sovereignty requires cutting out such middlemen.

tags: ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Sept. 19, 2025): The Hidden Cost of Walled Gardens

Explores how companies like Rover, TaskRabbit, and Nextdoor monetize content and relationships while creators and workers do the actual value-creation. Argues that sovereignty requires cutting out such middlemen.
